title: Resolution Problems
body: I use windowed mode while playing the game and all of a sudden my computer screen keeps telling me that the input is not support every time I try to go into the window with the actual game, even though I have increased the resolution of my computer screen. So now the resolution is even greater than when it was working. I don't know if it's a problem with my computer or the client or even something else.

replies.body: Thank you for responding, but right be for you commented I tried to fix the problem use a different thread https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/XpkVYX5Y-screen-resolution-stuck-at-too-high-a-resolution and it sort of work. I was still a bit fuzzy so i tried to change the resolution in game to the resolution of the monitor. And now the screen freaks out. Looks like I might have screwed myself.

Try making sure that the in-game resolution matches the resolution that your desktop is currently set to. That should be able to get those input working normally again, but hit me back up if that doesn't help.
